common

类 MessageSplitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.MessageSplitter

  • public class MessageSplitter
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles receiving partial or multiple messages. Received data is sent to this class, and individual messages are extracted. All methods are thread safe.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MessageSplitter() 

    • 方法概要

      Appends a newly received string to previously received strings.

      Returns the body of the specified message.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MessageSplitter

        public MessageSplitter()

    • 方法详细资料

      • appendRecvdString

        public void appendRecvdString(java.lang.String recvdString)
        Appends a newly received string to previously received strings.
        参数:
        recvdString - The received string.

      • nextMsg

        public java.lang.String nextMsg()
        返回:
        The first received message that has not previously been returned, or null if there is no complete message available.

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        返回:
        true if there is at least one unread complete message, false if there is not.

      • prependLengthHeader

        public static java.lang.String prependLengthHeader(java.lang.String msgWithoutHeader)
        Prepends a length header to the specified message. This method should be used by senders. The returned message can be handled by instances of this class when the message is received.
        参数:
        msgWithoutHeader - A message with no length header
        返回:
        The specified message, with the appropriate length header prepended.

      • typeOf

        public static MsgType typeOf(java.lang.String msg)
        Returns the type of the specified message.

      • bodyOf

        public static java.lang.String bodyOf(java.lang.String msg)
        Returns the body of the specified message.
